name: psychoroid.com | Open Source Generative AI 3D Engine
description: Generate and customize 3D assets with AI. Convert text and images to high-quality 3D models, optimize for games, 3D printing, and e-commerce. Chat, download, ship.

shortcuts.name: 3D Engine
shortcuts.description: Convert text or images to 3D with AI

shortcuts.name: Docs
shortcuts.description: Use psychoroid.com API to create your own 3D applications

en.name: psychoroid.com | Open Source Generative AI 3D Engine
en.description: Generate and customize 3D assets with AI. Convert text and images to high-quality models, optimize for games, 3D printing, and e-commerce. Chat, download, ship.

es.name: psychoroid.com | Motor 3D de IA Generativa
es.description: Genera y personaliza modelos 3D con IA. Convierte texto y imágenes en modelos de alta calidad, optimiza para juegos, impresión 3D y e-commerce. Chatea, descarga, envía.

fr.name: psychoroid.com | Open Source Generative AI 3D Engine
fr.description: Générez et personnalisez des modèles 3D avec IA. Convertissez texte et images en modèles de haute qualité, optimisés pour les jeux vidéos, l'impression 3D et le e-commerce. Chatez, téléchargez, utilisez.

ja.name: psychoroid.com | オープンソース生成AI 3Dエンジン
ja.description: テキストや画像をAIで3Dモデルに変換し、ゲーム、3D印刷、オンラインショップのために最適化します。チャット、ダウンロード、使用。

ko.name: psychoroid.com | 오픈소스 생성형 AI 3D 엔진
ko.description: 텍스트와 이미지를 AI로 3D 모델로 변환하여 게임, 3D 인쇄, 온라인 쇼핑의 용도로 최적화합니다. 채팅, 다운로드, 사용.

pt.name: psychoroid.com | Motor 3D de IA Generativa
pt.description: Gere e personalize modelos 3D com IA. Converta texto e imagens em modelos de alta qualidade, otimizados para jogos, impressão 3D e e-commerce. Chate, baixe, use.

zh.name: psychoroid.com | 开源生成式AI 3D引擎
zh.description: 将文本和图像转换为AI 3D模型，优化用于游戏、3D打印和电子商务。聊天、下载、使用。
